dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Oh well, I'll play a little, there's still time before I go to bed.
I opened my laptop and decided to play a game I recently downloaded.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: What was it called? The game... Was it called “The Game?!” It was made by my favorite developers, EcoKvas!

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Why are we playing as tumbleweeds?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Did I just collect “sausege”? Even I know that it's spelled “sausage”...
Suddenly, a loud jumpscare flashed on the screen!
Falling off my chair onto the floor, I tried to get a better look at what had scared me.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: WHAT ARE YOU?! GET OUT OF MY ROOM, YOU FAT FLY!!

dialogue.name: Fairy
dialogue.text: WHO DID YOU CALL A FLY, PUNK?
I looked closely and saw a strange and large creature.
This time, I could see its belly with holes in it, inside which were teeth.

dialogue.name: Strange figure
dialogue.text: Kid, watch your voice, you scream like you're being cut.

dialogue.name: Strange figure
dialogue.text: I'm the tooth fairy. Someone, I understand it's you, lost a tooth, so I came to take it. And anyway, I'm not so scary that you need to scream like that. It's rude, kid.
